articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google’s NotebookLM adds ‘Deep Research’ tool, support for more file types - TechCrunch
articles.description: The service is rolling out "Deep Research," a tool that will automate and simplify complex online research.
articles.content:
Google is updating NotebookLM, its AI note-taking and research assistant, with a new tool to help users simplify complex research, along with support for additional file types.
The service is rollin… [+1960 chars]
